item.title: Installing a `conda` package from a specific channel
item.description: While trying to set up some new packages in a conda environment, I accidentally “upgraded” to an incompatible version of one of the libraries. I created an environment to run Psi4 and wanted to add some new dependencies. Before proceeding, I decided to upgrade the packages in the environment using mamba upgrade --all. Before accepting the changes, I made sure there weren’t any major version upgrades, then proceeded with the upgrade. What I didn’t notice was that two of the libraries (libecpint and pint) were moved from the psi4 channel to the conda-forge channel. Psi4 is quite particular about it’s dependencies, so this change broke the installation.
